body: Storm told me that 'Stop Bugging Me' wasn't the map tiger was banned for. I made a mistake. Sorry :/
body_tagged: Storm told me that 'Stop Bugging Me' wasn't the map tiger was banned for. I made a mistake. Sorry :/
title: Sorry Guys.

replies.body:
Hey Thund3r, everyone makes mistakes its alright mate, but this post is considered as spam. Have a Happy New Year! And next time please refrain from creating such topics.
Thanks!
